overview:
Deepa Shah is the co-founder and Vice President, User Experience of Fab.com.

Born and raised in Ahmedabad, India, Deepa studied architecture at Center for Environmental Planning and Technology University (CEPT). She believes design is the indispensable part of any man-made creation. She finds design inspiration from the Pols (housing) in Ahmedabad old city, Jain temple at Ranakpur, Guggenheim museum at Bilbao, and the Barcelona chair by Mies Van Der Rohe.

At Fab, Deepa is responsible for creating many of the IT solutions that allow for members to be delighted when shopping on Fab online or through mobile apps.
